alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 11:12PM CDT until September 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Decatur County in south central Iowa... East central Ringgold County in south central Iowa... South central Clarke County in south central Iowa... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1112 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grand River, or 12 miles west of Leon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grand River around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Van Wert. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 17 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
